data.text: Niran Adetunji is an accounting graduate from Osun State Polytechnic and a Fellow of both the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) and Institute of Capital Market Registrars (ICMR) He is an Associate of Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (CITN). He is also a holder of MBA (Financial Management Strategy) from Ladoke Akintola University of Technology.

He began his career with SCIB Nig. & Co (Insurance Broker) as a Trainee Accountant in 1998 and later joined First Registrars in 2001 as Finance & Accounts Officer. In 2004, he was appointed the Head of Internal Audit, a position he held till May 2006 when he became the Head of Finance & Accounts.

Niran has attended several leadership, Managerial and Professional Courses both locally and internationally such as Financial Control & Cost Management, Advanced Audit Mgt. & Quality Assurance Review, Bank Inspection & Internal Control, Strategic Marketing and Selling skills among others.
He is happily married with children.
